definition: to beat with the fist/to hammer/to cudgel

sentences.chinese: 他憤怒地用拳捶擊桌子。

sentences.english: Strong thump massage function penetration muscle tissue, effectively relieve pain.
sentences.chinese: 強勁的捶擊按摩功能滲透肌肉組織，有效地減輕痠痛。

sentences.english: This ancestor screamed and pounded the walls, and no one came.
sentences.chinese: 這一祖先嘶叫並捶擊牆壁，而沒有人前來。

sentences.english: Conclusion Precordial thump could not terminate VF in the pig model of cardiac arrest.
sentences.chinese: 結論胸前捶擊不能終止本實驗豬模型中的室顫。

sentences.english: I could hear him hammering in the house next door.
sentences.chinese: 我能聽見他在隔壁房間捶擊的聲音。

sentences.english: The sea smites his own barren breast because he has no flowers to offer to the moon.
sentences.chinese: 大海捶擊他荒瘠的胸脯，因爲它沒有花獻給月亮。
